meanings.sent1: The choice of music at the party was felicitous, everyone enjoyed it.
meanings.sent2: Her felicitous choice of outfit for the interview impressed the hiring manager.
meanings.sent3: The felicitous timing of the rain shower cooled down the hot outdoor wedding.
meanings.sent4: The felicitous blend of flavors in the dish created a culinary masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The felicitous decision to take the scenic route led to breathtaking views.

meanings.sent1: The garden was a felicitous place to relax on a sunny afternoon.
meanings.sent2: The felicitous aroma of freshly baked cookies filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The felicitous surprise party brought a smile to her face.
meanings.sent4: The felicitous melody of the song lingered in his mind all day.
meanings.sent5: The felicitous colors of the painting brightened up the room.

meanings.definition: Marked by good fortune or happiness
meanings.sent1: Winning the lottery was a felicitous event that changed their lives.
meanings.sent2: The felicitous news of their promotion spread joy among the team.
meanings.sent3: The felicitous coincidence of meeting her childhood friend made her day.
meanings.sent4: The felicitous smile on her face showed her genuine happiness.
meanings.sent5: The felicitous weather on their wedding day made the ceremony even more special.
